text: (lokkhan) teangnoh haey ku a l laoh del chea mcheasa robsa puok anak . kmean te mcheasa del trauv ke korp sakkar yeang pit brakd meante trong muoy kt . trong chea anak bangkeut avei teangoasa dau che neah chaur puok anak korp sakkar tow champoh trong choh . haey trong chea anakakrobkrong avei teangoasa
